title: How do I complete email settings?
answer:
* Adding email account 

> Touch Settings > All > Add account. Touch Email to add an email account or touch Corporate to add an Exchange account.

> ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=76747)

*   Manual setup


> 1.  On the Account setup screen, enter your email account and password.
> 2.  Touch Manual Setup.
> 3.  Touch POP3 to configure the incoming server settings.
> 4.  Touch Next to configure the outgoing server settings.
